      • listaRecensioni

        public static java.lang.Object[][] listaRecensioni()
        Method used to create a matrix of the reviews that haven't been approved yet. This matrix is used to create the DefaultTableModel.
        Returns:
        a matrix of objects.

      • approvaRecensione

        public static void approvaRecensione(java.lang.String idRecensione)
        Method used to approve a specific review
        Parameters:
        idRecensione - the review's ID that has to be approved.

        Parameters:

      • listaUtenti

        public static java.lang.Object[][] listaUtenti(int iD)
        Method used to create a matrix of the users. This matrix is used to create the DefaultTableModel.
        Parameters:
        iD - the currently logged in moderator
        Returns:
        a matrix of objects.

      • modificaXPUtente

        public static void modificaXPUtente(java.lang.String op,
                                    java.lang.String id)
                             throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
        Method used to modify the user's xp points. Only a moderator can use this method.
        Parameters:
        op - a String that contains the xp points to add/remove to the user
        id - user's id.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException
